SEARCH
Package goldfish.model

Class Board

java.lang.Object
goldfish.model.Board
public class Board extends Object
The board class: Has a 2D array of tiles, two players (white and black), and a turn.

    Constructor for the tiles Creates the tiles and sets up the pieces

      public int isOccupied(int x, int y)
      Check if the tile at (x, y) is occupied and by whom
      Parameters:
      x - x location of the tile
      y - y location of the tile
      Returns:
      1 if white, 2 if black, 0 if not occupied
